name: Temple Lost Theft Run
description:
The deadly gorilla is after the life of the beautiful royal princess. There is only one for her to save her life and that is to run as fast as she can. The princess has to be very careful as there will be multiple obstacles and hindrances in her way. The track in the temple also has sudden turns and twists. As you will be playing as the princess, you will have to run as speedily as you could while avoiding all these obstacles.

One little mistake and the gorilla will be there to catch you and hold you captive forever.

Salient Features of Temple Lost Theft Run - Jungle Escape

These are some of the most remarkable features of this endless run game:

• No compromise on quality of graphics and visual effects
